name: @bcare/backend-customer-care
description: Sistem Backend API untuk Customer Care B-Care

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r dotenv/config mock/server.js dotenv_config_path=.env
scripts.mock: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r dotenv/config mock/server.js dotenv_config_path=.env
scripts.staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging node -r dotenv/config mock/server-clean.js dotenv_config_path=.env.staging
scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node -r dotenv/config mock/server-clean.js dotenv_config_path=.env.production
scripts.db:reset: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed

author: Tim Backend B-Care
